install.name: Sharable
install.author: P.J. Swesey
install.description: Sharable - A content plugin for Joomla! articles. This flexible plugin will place social sharing badges in your articles in a clean and non-intrusive way, similar to Mashable.com. Visit JoomlaDigger.com for free support, and information on bringing more traffic to your website and making more money.

param.name: preview_display
param.label: Article Preview Display
param.description: How do you want to display the buttons on article previews?

param.name: article_display
param.label: Full Article Display
param.description: How do you want to display the buttons on the full articles?

param.name: preview_style
param.label: Preview CSS Styles
param.description: CSS styles for the div wrapping the buttons on article previews.

param.name: article_style
param.label: Article CSS Styles
param.description: CSS styles for the div wrapping the buttons on full articles.

param.name: preview_preceding_html
param.label: Preview Preceding HTML
param.description: HTML to be displayed before the buttons on article previews.

param.name: preview_following_html
param.label: Preview Following HTML
param.description: HTML to be displayed after the buttons on article previews.

param.name: article_preceding_html
param.label: Article Preceding HTML
param.description: HTML to be displayed before the buttons on full articles.

param.name: article_following_html
param.default: Add this to your website
param.label: Article Following HTML
param.description: HTML to be displayed after the buttons on full articles.

param.name: excluded_categories
param.label: Excluded Categories
param.description: Comma-separated list of category IDs to exclude. Add 0 to not display these buttons on uncategorized articles.

param.description: What size do you want this button on the full articles?

param.label: Preview Send
param.description: Do you want to include Send with the Facebook button on article previews?

param.name: facebook_article_send
param.label: Article Send
param.description: Do you want to include Send with the Facebook button on full articles?

param.name: facebook_color
param.label: Color Scheme
param.description: You can choose a light or dark color scheme for the Facebook button.

param.name: facebook_font
param.label: Button Font
param.description: Which font do you want the Facebook button to use?

param.name: facebook_include_root
param.label: Include fb-root div
param.description: Facebook plugins require that a div with id "fb-root" be included on the page. If your site's HTML already has Facebook Connect or another Facebook plugin, that div is already included so you should set this to "no".
